name: Idle Champions: Aarakocra Glitch Orkira Skin & Feat Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Orkira (if you don't already own them) Aarakocra Glitch Orkira Skin An Epic Feat for Orkira 7 Gold Orkira Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts
